Hot and Bothered T-Shirt (Male)
T-shirt Hot and Bothered (homme)
Hot and Bothered-T-Shirt (Männer)
Maglietta Hot and Bothered (uomo)
Camiseta Hot and Bothered (Hombre)
Hot and Bothered Tシャツ （男性用）
핫 앤 바더드 셔츠 (남성)
Hot and Bothered Shirt (Men)
Hot and Bothered 襯衫(男用)
Hot and Bothered 襯衫(男用)
Hot and Bothered T-Shirt (Male)
kDesc

I know what you are thinking. Why do I need yet another T-Shirt? I already have more than 30! Well, this one is very unique and rare, you won't find anything quite like it anywhere else. No kidding. Get it before it's too late!
Je sais ce que vous vous dites. "J'ai assez de t-shirts comme ça." Sauf que celui-ci est vraiment unique. Je rigole pas ! Procurez-vous-le avant qu'il ne soit trop tard !
Ich weiß schon: Brauch ich wirklich noch ein T-Shirt? Dieses ist etwas ganz Besonderes. Ungelogen. Hol es dir, bevor es zu spät ist!
So cosa stai pensando. "A cosa mi serve un'altra t-shirt?" Ma questa è molto rara ed esclusiva. Non sto scherzando. Non fartela sfuggire o sarà troppo tardi!
Sé lo que estás pensando. ¿Por qué iba a necesitar otra camiseta? Ah, pero esta es única. En serio. ¡Hazte con ella antes de que sea tarde!
あなたの考えはお見通し。「もう T シャツはいらない」と思っているんでしょ？でもこれはただの T シャツじゃなくて、とっても珍しい T シャツなんです。ほら、なくなっちゃいますよ、急いで！
당신이 무슨 생각을 하고 있는지 알아요. 왜 제게 다른 티셔츠가 필요한 거죠? 이미 30장도 넘게 있는데요! 음, 이건 매우 독특하고 쉽게 찾아보기 힘들잖아요. 말도 안 돼요. 늦기 전에 기회를 잡으세요!

I know what you are thinking. Why do I need yet another T-Shirt? I already have more than 30! Well, this one is very unique and rare, you won't find anything quite like it anywhere else. No kidding. Get it before it's too late!
我知道你在想什麼。為什麼我要另一件襯衫？這件非常罕有獨特。不是開玩笑。立即行動，勿失良機！
我知道你在想什麼。為什麼我要另一件襯衫？這件非常罕有獨特。不是開玩笑。立即行動，勿失良機！

I know what you are thinking. Why do I need yet another T-Shirt? I already have more than 30! Well, this one is very unique and rare, you won't find anything quite like it anywhere else. No kidding. Get it before it's too late!
